text: S702 Hakikisha kila unaponyunyiza dawa kuna dawa ya kuzuia wadudu,ugonjwa wa baridi na mbolea. Baada ya kupanda nyanya, piga dawa kama PROVE au LAMBDEX dhidi ya viwavi, PEARL au GOLDAZIM dhidi ya damping off na STARTER FERTILIZER ili mche ukue haraka. 0711218388
sents:
S702 Hakikisha kila unaponyunyiza dawa kuna dawa ya kuzuia wadudu,ugonjwa wa baridi na mbolea.
Baada ya kupanda nyanya, piga dawa kama PROVE au LAMBDEX dhidi ya viwavi, PEARL au GOLDAZIM dhidi ya damping off na STARTER FERTILIZER ili mche ukue haraka. 0711218388

text: S702 Baadhi ya mbegu aina ya F1 variety ni nzuri sana na huhimili magonjwa. Mbegu ninayopanda mimi na nazipenda ni Eden F1, Assila F1, Prostar F1, Anna F1 na Corazon F1. Tembelea duka la vifaa vya kilimo lililo karibu ili uchague mbegu iliyo na bei utayoweza kununua. Panda nyanya kwa umbali wa futi mbili (60 cm) kwa futi tatu (90 cm) . weka nyanya mbolea mara tatu. Kutegemea na aina ya mchanga wa shamba lako, panda kwa mbolea aina ya DAP, DSP au NPK 171717 gramu kumi . Kisha weka CAN baada ya wiki tatu gramu kumi na urejelee tena baada ya wiki mbili zinazofuata. Ni muhimu pia kutumia mbolea ya samadi. 0711218388
sents:
S702 Baadhi ya mbegu aina ya F1 variety ni nzuri sana na huhimili magonjwa.
Mbegu ninayopanda mimi na nazipenda ni Eden F1, Assila F1, Prostar F1, Anna F1 na Corazon F1.
Tembelea duka la vifaa vya kilimo lililo karibu ili uchague mbegu iliyo na bei utayoweza kununua.
Panda nyanya kwa umbali wa futi mbili (60 cm) kwa futi tatu (90 cm) . weka nyanya mbolea mara tatu.
Kutegemea na aina ya mchanga wa shamba lako, panda kwa mbolea aina ya DAP, DSP au NPK 171717 gramu kumi .
Kisha weka CAN baada ya wiki tatu gramu kumi na urejelee tena baada ya wiki mbili zinazofuata.
Ni muhimu pia kutumia mbolea ya samadi. 0711218388

Wakati mwingine walaghai hufanya hivyo ili walete dawa zao ili tununue! Haya huleta mulipuko. Yafaa tahadhari na kina cha uchunguzi wakati wote- AESA (Agro Ecosystem Analysis) Hatua kwa hatua ya kukua kwa mahindi. Niulize kuhusu Mahindi, Chai, na Maharagwe.

Wakati mwingine walaghai hufanya hivyo ili walete dawa zao ili tununue!
Haya huleta mulipuko.
Yafaa tahadhari na kina cha uchunguzi wakati wote- AESA (Agro Ecosystem Analysis) Hatua kwa hatua ya kukua kwa mahindi.
Niulize kuhusu Mahindi, Chai, na Maharagwe.

text: S96 Kwanza lima shamba,kama uko na mbolea manure mwaka kwa shamba alafu lima tena na umake arrows,panda kwa kutumia D.A.P per hecter 50kg with 8kg of maize seed,after 3 to 4 weeks balilia then topdres using urea in avery smal amount due to alot of acid,then after another 3weeks balilia tena ama uwaplly hurry ken,then C.A.N alafu wacha ikomae for 4months then unaexa harvest ukongoe then aply dawa ya kutosha ukitumia akitara ama ile nyingine yoyote mzuri then fanya packaging,am very sure utafanikiwa.
sents: S96 Kwanza lima shamba,kama uko na mbolea manure mwaka kwa shamba alafu lima tena na umake arrows,panda kwa kutumia D.A.P per hecter 50kg with 8kg of maize seed,after 3 to 4 weeks balilia then topdres using urea in avery smal amount due to alot of acid,then after another 3weeks balilia tena ama uwaplly hurry ken,then C.A.N alafu wacha ikomae for 4months then unaexa harvest ukongoe then aply dawa ya kutosha ukitumia akitara ama ile nyingine yoyote mzuri then fanya packaging,am very sure utafanikiwa.

text: S255 Dawa ya kuuwa nyasi ni nyingi. Kwa mfano kuna selective & non selective herbicides. Yaani, selective huchagua inachoangamiza, eg kama umepanda mahindi na bado changa, waweza tumia selective kama: Lumax, Primagram etc BUT SIO kwa broad leaved crops kama maharagwe, sunflower etc. Hizo dawa pale juu, zaweza kuchanganywa na dawa zingine kama vile: sencor for perfect results. Now, NON SELECTIVE herbicides hazichagui ni nyasi ama ni mmea upi wa kuangamizwa. Yaani kila kitu hapa kitaungua. Mfano wa madawa haya ni: Herbikill, Gramoxone, Roundup, Weedle, etc. Sioni madhara yasiyo na manufaa, but the use of herbicides is more efficient than kupalilia.
sents:
S255 Dawa ya kuuwa nyasi ni nyingi.
Kwa mfano kuna selective & non selective herbicides.
Yaani, selective huchagua inachoangamiza, eg kama umepanda mahindi na bado changa, waweza tumia selective kama: Lumax, Primagram etc BUT SIO kwa broad leaved crops kama maharagwe, sunflower etc. Hizo dawa pale juu, zaweza kuchanganywa na dawa zingine kama vile: sencor for perfect results.
Now, NON SELECTIVE herbicides hazichagui ni nyasi ama ni mmea upi wa kuangamizwa.
Yaani kila kitu hapa kitaungua.
Mfano wa madawa haya ni: Herbikill, Gramoxone, Roundup, Weedle, etc. Sioni madhara yasiyo na manufaa, but the use of herbicides is more efficient than kupalilia.
